mapper.select: select pname, sqty from product where sqty>0 and rownum<11 order by sqty desc
select pname, sum(oqty) sqty from ordered where ordered_date>='23/01/01' group by pname order by sqty desc
select gender as name,count(1) as count from member group by gender
select age as name, count(1) as count from member group by age order by age desc

select y, ft.tpo sales, ft.tso expense, (ft.tpo-ft.tso) profit from (select total.y, sum(total.po) tpo, sum(total.so) tso from (select To_char(ordered_date, 'YYYY') y, sum(price*oqty) po, sum(saleprice*oqty) so from ordered group by ordered_date) total group by y) ft order by y desc
